entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Becoming mainly cloudy late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
